products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Ecru Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Roller Blind
products.description: This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Mushroom Roller Blind
products.description: Bring luxury to any family space with the practical versailles mushroom blackout roller blind. This print inspired by chic french interiors features an ornate pattern picked out in grey and exceptionally printed on convenient wipe-clean, blackout fabric. The subtle, two-tone design gives this intricate motif a simplicity that can be used to great effect. Layer with varying shades of grey to add depth and drama to a room.

products.title: Magnolia Blackout Inky Roller Blind
products.description: Magnolia blackout is a beautiful floral patterned fabric available in two lovely colours. This bold white and grey roller blind is perfect to add a floral touch to any room in your home. The neutral colours in the pattern also mean this blind will go with a lot of decors. Product id: db-rbx1880 fabric colour: inky material: 80% polyester 20% cotton lining: white backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes magnolia blackout inky roller blind in grey/multicoloured.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Ivory Roller Blind
products.description: Versailles blackout ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers.

products.title: Maine Ll Blackout Angora Roller Blind
products.description: The maine ll blackout range is available in a choice of 3 beautiful colours. A perfect addition to any room for a very affordable price. This brown roller blind will create a cosy feel and is perfect for rooms where keeping light out is key such as your bedroom or living room. products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen.

products.title: Podium Blackout Midnight Roller Blind
products.description: This chic pattern will make a bold graphic statement thanks to its interplay of horizontal lines. Contrasting shades of grey give this streamlined print an intriguing depth and will add a sleek, masculine edge to your space. The podium midnight blackout roller blind is created from durable blackout fabric to help you maintain your peace and privacy in a swift and simple motion using the sidewinder chain.

products.description: The midas blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: The stripy pink is a fun way to inject some funky colour and style into any room. But it's far from style over substance; with its high quality blackout material, this blind is the perfect way to ensure a great night's sleep. Why not add the stripy pink to a child's or guest bedroom to give the room a fresh range of vivid colours at minimal cost and effort. Or perhaps add a sense of flair to the kitchen whilst you prepare some of your favourite dishes.

products.title: Hive Blackout Barley Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout barley perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Sand Dune - Roller Blind
products.description: If you love to get away from the hustle and bustle and make your way to the coast then the anthology (blackout) range's sand dune fabric could be just what you need. It combines an intricate weave with a colour that ebbs and flows effortlessly. Perfect for adding a refined touch to any home. When you take in the intricate way in which the shades and tones flow into one another you come to appreciate the keen eye for detail that must have created it.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Macaroon Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Our anthology range is the perfect way to integrate the functionality of a blackout blind with the aesthetics of a contemporary style you'll never want to be without again. Macaroon cream has a slightly rich and dusky element to it which we know you're instantly going to fall in love with. Country chic is a great choice to explore further if you want to add this stunning fabric to a completely new style of decor.
